answers.answer: Hi,Have you sought consult with your OB?I suggest you seek immediate consult with your OB for proper assessment and evaluation on what causes your headaches.How is your current blood pressure?Any rapid gain in weight?Swelling of lower extremities?One thing to exclude in pregnancy with associated headaches is preeclampsia which may be associated with urinary protein, headaches and visual symptoms. Do stay calm and have all these checked by your OB so that your pregnancy will be closely supervised.Take care and do keep us posted for anything.

Thank you for replying to me,  erm blood pressure ok no rapid weight gain yet, and no swelling yet, my midwife did lots of tests to see if it was Pre-eclampsia, she found a small trace of protein in my urine but said I have not got that but will keep an eye on me, went to see doctor again this morning and he now says I should see an eye doc to see if its something to do with my eyes, I am still worried as you may have guessed, but he reasures me that its nothing to worry about, but thats easier for him to say. Thanks again for youe help love T.J.

question: Hi, I really hope someone can help as my doctops will not listen to me, I have started having headaches about six odd weeks ago but for the last few weeks I seem to be having vision problems too. I keep having like migraines with the zigzags and flashing lights but also when that clears my visions is blurred like having double visionnd all I get from my doctor is its due to my pregnancy but how can that be. I am 20 weeks pregnant with bad vision and headaches I am so worried no one will listen to me, I hope someone (maybe a doctor out there) will know whats going on or what I shoud do about this. Thank you T.J
title: Pregnant with bad headaches & weird vision
